column4: Does anyone know of a way so that when I print a document it prints the doc to a pdf file rather then sending it to a printer? Is there an app that will make a virtual printer or something?
most apps have a print to file checkbox somewhere
this is using a print icon that is on a web page, I will check file > print in firefox to see if there is similar
the only option I get since it is a window with no file menu bar is the "print page" button located on the web page
